Wand, common
This charred and blackened wooden wand has 3 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to extinguish a nonmagical flame within 10 feet of you that is no larger than a small campfire. The wand regains all expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wandâ€™s last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the wand transforms into a @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressitems.Item.KPwandofignition]{wand of ignition}.
